title: 1327: Five Mindset Techniques for Fitness Success
description:
In this episode, Sal, Adam & Justin cover five ways to develop a mindset that will improve success with anyone's fitness journey. 

  • How your mindset dictates your success. (2:38)
  • The misconceptions surrounding the RIGHT mindset. (6:22)
  • #1 – STOP working out and START practicing. (8:10)
  • #2 – Workout because you LOVE yourself and not because you hate yourself. (16:20)
  • #3 – Motivation vs discipline. (27:46)
  • #4 – Consistency over perfection. (33:32)
  • #5 – Chase health over aesthetics. (37:20)

Related Links/Products Mentioned

  • July Promotion: MAPS Strong ½ off!! **Promo code “STRONG50” at checkout**
  • Visit Legion Athletics for the exclusive offer for Mind Pump listeners! **Code “mindpump” at checkout**
  • Stop Working Out And Start Practicing - Mind Pump Media
  • Workout Because You Love Yourself Not Because You Hate Yourself – Mind Pump Blog
  • Mind Pump Podcast - YouTube
  • Mind Pump Free Resources 

People Mentioned
